item.title: AsciiDoc test
item.description: Asciidoc Example 5. Constrained bold, italic, and monospace It has strong significance to me. I cannot stress this enough. Type OK to accept. That really has to go. Example 6. Unconstrained bold, italic, and monospace_ Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) That‚Äôs fanfreakintastic! Don‚Äôt pass generic Objects to methods that accept Strings! It was Beatlemania! Can‚Äôt pick one? Let‚Äôs use them all.

item.title: Formules sur page couverture du Colmez
item.description: Lagrange 1771: $ |G| = |H|.|G/H| $ (Colmez p.41: Le cardinal de G groupe fini est multiple du cardinal du sous-groupe H et du quotient G/H ) Fourier 1811: $ \phi(t) = \int e^{2i\pi t x}\hat\phi(x) dx $ ( p.335 - $ \hat\phi $ transform√©e de Fourier de $ \phi \in \mathscr L^1 (R^m) $ pour tout x,t $ \in R^m $) Poissons 1816: $ \sum_{n \in \Z} \phi(n)= \sum \hat \phi(n) $

item.title: Markdown Experiments
item.description: Thanks to markdown-it for most of the content of this file! –nm h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Strikethrough Blockquotes Blockquotes can also be nested…
